hero.title: Bash John
hero.subtitle: I am a passionate and dedicated full-stack web developer from the Caribbean. I specialize in crafting intuitive, high-performing websites that not only look great but also drive results. Let's build something amazing together.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I am a professional full-stack web developer with a Bachelor's degree earned in China, bringing a global perspective to every project I undertake. My Caribbean roots fuel my creativity and resilience, while my international education has equipped me with cutting-edge technical skills and cultural adaptability.
about.description: Passionate about web development, I thrive on transforming complex ideas into seamless, user-friendly websites. My diligent and hardworking nature ensures that every project I deliver is polished, efficient, and aligned with your goals. Whether you need a dynamic application or a sleek portfolio, I am dedicated to making your vision a reality.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Ready to bring your ideas to life? Whether you're looking for a reliable developer to enhance your online presence or need an innovative solution for your business, I'd love to hear from you.
